SCTX:
Begin MuseumMaceSlurring


if ("Torasa Aram".maceslurring < 2)
	Disable
endif

if ("Torasa Aram".maceslurring == 2)
	Enable
endif

if (OnActivate == 1)
	set "Torasa Aram".maceslurring to 3
	Activate
	player->removeitem "mace of slurring_x" 1
	player->additem "mace of slurring" 1
endif

End MuseumMaceSlurring
